syncData.content:
{"latex.json":"{
	// Place your snippets for latex here. Each snippet is defined under a snippet name and has a prefix, body and
	// description. The prefix is what is used to trigger the snippet and the body will be expanded and inserted. Possible variables are:
	// $1, $2 for tab stops, $0 for the final cursor position, and ${1:label}, ${2:another} for placeholders. Placeholders with the
	// same ids are connected.
	// Example:
	// "Print to console": {
	// 	"prefix": "log",
	// 	"body": [
	// 		"console.log('$1');",
	// 		"$2"
	// 	],
	// 	"description": "Log output to console"
	// }

	"New Document Uoc": {
		"prefix": "uoc",
		"body": [
			"\\documentclass[12pt, letterpaper]{article}",
			"\\usepackage{listings}",
			"\\usepackage{fontenc}",
			"\\usepackage[indent=20pt]{parskip}",
			"\\usepackage[dvipsnames]{xcolor}",
			"\\usepackage{fancyhdr}",
			"\\usepackage{pdflscape}",
			"\\usepackage{amsmath}",
			"\\usepackage{amssymb}",
			"\\usepackage{minted}",
			"\\usepackage{multicol}",
			"\\usepackage{subfiles}",
			"\\usepackage{booktabs}",
			"\\usepackage{fouriernc}",
			"\\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}",
			"\\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}",
			"\\usepackage{xr-hyper}",
			"\\usepackage[colorlinks]{hyperref}",
			"\\usepackage{csquotes}",
			"\\usepackage[backend=biber, style=numeric, citestyle=numeric]{biblatex}",
			"\\usepackage[american]{babel}",
			"\\usepackage{titling}",
			"\\addbibresource{../${9:Library}.bib}",
			"\\usepackage{graphicx}",
			"\\hypersetup{",
			"\tlinkcolor=BrickRed,",
			"\tcitecolor=Green,",
			"\tfilecolor=Mulberry,",
			"\turlcolor=NavyBlue,",
			"\tmenucolor=BrickRed,",
			"\truncolor=Mulberry,",
			"\tlinkbordercolor=BrickRed,",
			"\tcitebordercolor=Green,",
			"\tfilebordercolor=Mulberry,",
			"\turlbordercolor=NavyBlue,",
			"\tmenubordercolor=BrickRed,",
			"\trunbordercolor=Mulberry,",
			"\tpdftitle={PAC ${2:Nº} ${1:Assignatura}},",
			"\tpdfpagemode=FullScreen,",
			"\t}",
			"\\usepackage{geometry}",
			"\\geometry{",
			"\ta4paper,",
			"\ttotal={170mm,257mm},",
			"\tleft=20mm,",
			"\ttop=20mm,",
			"\t}",
			"\\setlength{\\lineskip}{20pt}",
			"\\usepackage{subfiles}",
			"",
			"\\title{${1:Assignatura} PAC ${2:Nº}}",
			"\\author{Eduard Perez Mendez}",
			"\\date{\\today}",
			"",
			"",
			"",
			"\\begin{document}",
			"",
			"\\begin{titlepage} % Suppresses headers and footers on the title page",
			"\t\\centering % Centre everything on the title page",
			"\t\\scshape % Use small caps for all text on the title page",
			"\t\\vspace*{\\baselineskip} % White space at the top of the page",
			"",
			"\t",
			"\t%Title",
			"\t\\rule{\\textwidth}{1.6pt}\\vspace*{-\\baselineskip}\\vspace*{2pt} % Thick horizontal rule",
			"\t\\rule{\\textwidth}{0.4pt} % Thin horizontal rule",
			"\t",
			"\t\\vspace{0.75\\baselineskip} % Whitespace above the title",
			"\t",
			"\t{\\LARGE ${3:T1} \\\\\\ ${4:T2} \\\\\\ ${5:T3} \\\\\\ } % Title",
			"\t",
			"\t\\vspace{0.75\\baselineskip} % Whitespace below the title",
			"\t",
			"\t\\rule{\\textwidth}{0.4pt}\\vspace*{-\\baselineskip}\\vspace{3.2pt} % Thin horizontal rule",
			"\t\\rule{\\textwidth}{1.6pt} % Thick horizontal rule",
			"\t",
			"\t\\vspace{2\\baselineskip} % Whitespace after the title block",
			"\t",
			"",
			"\t%Subtitle",
			"\t{\\Large PAC ${2:PAC} \\\\\\ ${6:SUB} \\\\\\ ${7:SUB} \\\\\\ }",
			"\t\\vspace*{3\\baselineskip} % Whitespace under the subtitle",
			"\t",
			"",
			"\t%Editor(s)",
			"\t\\vfill",
			"\t",
			"\tAuthor",
			"\t",
			"\t\\vspace{0.5\\baselineskip} % Whitespace before the editors",
			"\t",
			"\t{\\scshape\\Large \\theauthor \\\\\\ } % Editor list",
			"\t",
			"\t\\vspace{0.5\\baselineskip} % Whitespace below the editor list",
			"\t",
			"\t",
			"\t%Date",
			"\t\\thedate % Publication year",
			"\t%Afiliation",
			"\t\\vfill",
			"\t\\includegraphics[scale=0.1]{../../uoc_negativo}",
			"\t\\vspace{0.3\\baselineskip}",
			"",
			"\t%\\vspace{12\\baselineskip}",
			"",
			"",
			"\\end{titlepage}",
			"",
			"\\pagestyle{fancy}",
			"\\fancyfoot[C]{\\thepage}",
			"\\fancyhead[R]{\\emph{\\theauthor}}",
			"\\fancyhead[L]{${8:SHORT}}",
			"\\fancyhead[C]{PAC ${2:Nº}}",
			"",
			"\\newpage",
			"",
			"$0",
			"",
			"",
			"",
			"\\end{document}"
		],
		"description": "New Document Uoc"
	},

	"New document": {
		"prefix": "newdoc",
		"body": [
			"\\documentclass[12pt, letterpaper]{article}",
			"\\usepackage{listings}",
			"\\usepackage{minted}",
			"\\usepackage{fontenc}",
			"\\usepackage{parskip}",
			"\\usepackage{hyperref}",
			"\\usepackage{fancyhdr}",
			"\\usepackage{listings}",
			"\\usepackage{pdflscape}",
			"\\usepackage{booktabs}",
			"\\hypersetup{",
			"\tcolorlinks=true,",
			"\tlinkcolor=blue,",
			"\tfilecolor=magenta,",
			"\turlcolor=cyan,",
			"\tpdftitle={${1:Title}},",
			"\tpdfpagemode=FullScreen,",
			"\t}",
			"\\usepackage{geometry}",
			"\t\\geometry{",
			"\ta4paper,",
			"\ttotal={170mm,257mm},",
			"\tleft=20mm,",
			"\ttop=20mm,",
			"\t}",
			"\\setlength{\\lineskip}{20pt}",
			"\\usepackage{subfiles}",
			"",
			"\\title{${1:Title}}",
			"\\author{\\emph{Eduard Perez Mendez}}",
			"\\date{${3:Month} ${2:Day}, ${4:Year}}",
			"",
			"",
			"\\begin{document}",
			"",
			"\\pagestyle{fancy}",
			"\\fancyfoot[C]{}",
			"\\fancyhead[L]{\\emph{Eduard Perez Mendez}}",
			"\\fancyhead[C]{Titulo de ejemplo}",
			"\\fancyhead[R]{\\emph{\\thepage}}",
			"",
			"\\begin{titlepage}",
			"\t\\maketitle",
			"\t\\thispagestyle{empty}",
			"\\end{titlepage}",
			"\\newpage",
			"",
			"$0",
			"",
			"\\end{document}"
		],
		"description": "New Uoc document"
	},

	"Bold": {
		"prefix": ["bf", "bold"],
		"body": ["\\textbf{${1:TEXT}} $0"],
		"description": "Bold"
	},

	"Italize": {
		"prefix": ["it", "emph"],
		"body": ["\\emph{${1:TEXT}} $0"],
		"description": "Italize"
	},

	"Subfile": {
		"prefix": "sub",
		"body": [
			"%! TEX root = ../${1:PARENT}.tex",
			"\\documentclass[.../${1:PARENT}.tex]{subfiles}",
			"\\usepackage{minted}",
			"\\usepackage{fontenc}",
			"\\usepackage{booktabs}",
			"\\usepackage[colorlinks]{hyperref}",
			"% \\externaldocument{TEX_PARA_REF_CRUZ}",
			"\\begin{document}",
			"",
			"$0",
			"",
			"\\end{document}"
		],
		"description": "Subfile"
	},
	"Minted": {
		"prefix": "mint",
		"body": ["\\begin{minted}[breaklines, autogobble]{$1}", "$0", "\\end{minted}"],
		"description": "To add code block"
	},

	"Itemize": {
		"prefix": "begit",
		"body": ["\\begin{itemize}", "", "\\item[$1] $0", "", "\\end{itemize}"],
		"description": "To add code block"
	},

	"Bold & Emph": {
		"prefix": "bfe",
		"body": ["\\textbf{\\emph{${1:TEXT}}} $0"],
		"description": "Bold and emphatise (italise) text"
	},

	"P-value": {
		"prefix": "pval",
		"body": ["\\$p-value\\$"],
		"description": "Pvalue shortcut as math"
	}
}
"}
